        write the page header and data into the PageWriter's output stream.
        Parameters:
        data - the data of the page
        valueCount - - the amount of values in that page
        statistics - - the statistics for that page
        maxTimestamp - - timestamp maximum in given data
        minTimestamp - - timestamp minimum in given data
        Returns:
        byte size of the page header and uncompressed data in the page body.

        PageException
